SPELL_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ALLIED, EffectController() )

local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY, EffectController() ) local target_one = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target_one ~= nil then filter:SetCardInstance( target_one ) filter:AddExtra( FILTER_EXTRA_FLIP_CARD_INSTANCE ) end
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION:
if EffectDC():Get_Targets(0) ~= nil and EffectDC():Get_Targets(1) ~= nil then local target_one = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) local target_two = EffectDC():Get_Targets(1):Get_CardPtr(0)
if target_one ~= nil and target_two ~= nil then local controller_one = target_one:GetController() local controller_two = target_two:GetController() if controller_one ~= nil and controller_two ~= nil then EffectDC():Set_PlayerPtr(2, controller_one) EffectDC():Set_PlayerPtr(3, controller_two) EffectDC():Set_Int(4, 1) -- this is a flag to say 'sure, proceed with the exchange' end end end
SPELL_ABILITY.DURATION: local target_one_dc = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0) local target_two_dc = EffectDC():Get_Targets(1) local exchange = EffectDC():Get_Int(4) if exchange == 1 then if target_one_dc ~= nil and target_one_dc:Get_CardPtr(0) ~= nil then return false end if target_two_dc ~= nil and target_two_dc:Get_CardPtr(0) ~= nil then return false end end return true
